title: Dynamic objects force each other into the ground.

content.raw:
[Video of this bug](https://youtu.be/nnLhh6V3660)

When placing a sensor on top of a default Gazebo cube or other dynamic object, the sensor forces the object into the ground plane or slides it around. Tested on gazebo default.

This probably has to do with the auto-disabling of contacts after a short time between the cube and the ground. For some reason, the contacts between the sensor and the cube aren't ever disabled. I also verified that this works with a non-sensor dynamic object:

![Screenshot from 2017-05-02 13-18-37.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3851425020-Screenshot_from_2017-05-02_13-18-37.png)
